value.title: DAX Fridays! #95: Binning, Frequency and relative frequency | Data profiler
value.excerpt: This is the first of a series of videos about data profiling and descriptive statistics. In today's video, I will show you how to bin data,  calculate the frequency and relative frequency using DAX.  What you think about the series? let me know in the comment box.  Download file here: https://curbal.com/blog/glossary/median-dax-functions

value.title: How I killed the refresh functionality for Power Bi dataflows...so you dont have to...

If you are getting this dataflow error, then you probably have the same issue: Error: Data source credentials are missing or invalid.

value.title: Power BI Tips & Tricks #07: Change multiple hardcoded path sources at once in Power BI

I am going to show you an easy way to solve this.  Here you can download the pbix file: http://trantor.synology.me:5000/fbsharing/nc9kfXTw
